8","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://afeeaf606448b835cf025a8ed44b544a5076e6430d1ddc5155e18107a24af1dc","dweb:/ipfs/QmcRytS1QikvMyd7gH9dU3kUNZp33mMouvRnUuqvJC71NQ"]},"src/interfaces/IHelper.sol":{"keccak256":"0xcb04e1d142347550241752894ebdb18b2509ac2fef62d1500c0f388f24bf0fbf","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://90011a6766b46ebe948ff3c7c901bf2aa108702713a86d53927e1399b838c444","dweb:/ipfs/QmTTGEEtQQwVSSALAA3fmSXG6S5C49iAcfRbHh6SPb2BRe"]},"src/interfaces/IXpMigrate.sol":{"keccak256":"0x46287dcbb7b228cf72a280f08f5b3a483526df096ffa2dd4ff64991ccd172e3d","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://93e8c10a24cff21a9249bd3fc028fbe8a41888d9e22a7e952e14f5fcf151da8c","dweb:/ipfs/QmYDSNo7Y9eYw9MKxhi5TF2m2wThLPxJ91gc36tvtYXJkG"]}},"version":1}

claim(uint256).details: Checks user's tier, cooldown period, and claimable amount before minting tokens

params.pointAmount: The amount of points the user wants to convert to tokens

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

recordPoints(address,uint256,uint8).details: Can only be called by the backend service when the contract is not paused

params.actionType: The type of action performed to earn points
params.pointsAmount: The number of points to record for user
params.user: The address of the user earning points

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

backendService().notice: Address of the backend service authorized to call certain functions

baseConversionRate().notice: Base conversion rate from points to tokens

claim(uint256).notice: Allows users to claim XpMigrate tokens based on their points

recordPoints(address,uint256,uint8).notice: Allows backend service to record points for users

xpMigrateContract().notice: Interface for the XpMigrate token contract
